name: Smartwool PhD Ski Ultra Light Socks - Unisex
description: Close fitting socks without cushioning designed to work with tight-fitting performance ski boots. Reinforced high-impact zones prolong the life of your socks.Made of soft, itch-free merino wool, with nylon and elastane to maintain fit.Banded fit system features elastic arches and ankle braces, with flex zones to eliminate bunching, slipping, and sagging.Flat knit side panels and toe seams reduce compression.
